about_the_game:
An original Soundtrack of Three Fairies' Hoppin' Flappin' Great Journey!
A retro BGM soundtrack that paints the world of the game.

It mainly contains songs from "Fairy Wars" and "Touhou Sangetsusei".

"Sunny Milk's Scarlet Mist Incident", "A Land Resplendent With Nature's Beauty", "Magus Night",
"The Fairy's Adventurous Tale", " The Hide-and-Seek Lifestyle at the Shrine", "Youkai Modern Colony",
"The Capital City of Flowers in the Sky", "The Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner", "Cinderella Cage",
"The Gensokyo the Gods Loved", "Wind God Girl", and "Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom"
are additionally recorded.
New music for the next work (provisional) will be added as they develop!

A retro BGM soundtrack that paints the world of the game.
